00044 int MetricCalculator::calculateMetrics(){
00045 
00046         if(evaluatorObject.IsInitialized() && evaluatorObject.getImageSize()>0){
00047                 //setting array size of overlap result
00048                 resultOverlap = new double*[(evaluatorObject.getCountGt()+2)];
00049                 for(int i = 0; i < evaluatorObject.getCountGt()+2; i++)
00050                         resultOverlap[i] = new double[(evaluatorObject.getCountMs()+2)];
00051 
00052                 //setting array size for GT metrics result
00053                 resultGtMetrics = new double*[evaluatorObject.getCountGt()];
00054                 for(int i = 0; i < evaluatorObject.getCountGt(); i++)
00055                         resultGtMetrics[i] = new double[noOfMetricsGt];
00056                 //setting array size for MS metrics result
00057                 resultMsMetrics = new double*[evaluatorObject.getCountMs()];
00058                 for(int i = 0; i < evaluatorObject.getCountMs(); i++)
00059                         resultMsMetrics[i] = new double[noOfMetricsMs];
00060 
00061                 for( int i =0; i< evaluatorObject.getCountGt()+2; i++){
00062                         for(int j =0; j<evaluatorObject.getCountMs()+2; j++){
00063                                 resultOverlap[i][j]=0;
00064                         }
00065                 }
00066 
00067                 for (int i =0; i<evaluatorObject.getCountGt(); i++){
00068                         for (int j =0; j<noOfMetricsGt; j++){
00069                                 resultGtMetrics[i][j]=0;
00070                         }
00071                 }
00072 
00073 
00074                 for (int i =0; i<evaluatorObject.getCountMs(); i++){
00075                         for (int j =0; j<noOfMetricsMs; j++){
00076                                 resultMsMetrics[i][j]=0;
00077                         }
00078                 }
00079 
00080                 //Calculating the results
00081                 cout << "[Check Point]: " << "Calculating Overlap Matrix" << endl;
00082                 calculateOverlap();
00083                 cout << "[Check Point]: " << "Calculating Ground Truth Region Based Metrics" << endl;
00084                 calculateGtMetrics();
00085                 cout << "[Check Point]: " << "Calculating Machine Segmented Region Based Metrics" << endl;
00086                 calculateMsMetrics();
00087                 cout << "[Check Point]: " << "Successfully Calculated the Metrics :)" << endl;
00088                 return 1;
00089         } else {
00090                 cout << "[ERROR]" << "Evaluator Not Initialized Properly :(" << endl;
00091                 return 0;
00092         }
00093 
00094 }

00097 void MetricCalculator::calculateOverlap(){
00098 
00099         vector<string> vec_comparisons;         //stores the performed comparisons
00100 
00101         if(evaluatorObject.getRegionCorrespondence()!="") {
00102                 vector<string> vecCorrespondence;       //set of correspondences like GT1:MS2,MS3,MS4
00103                 vector<string> vecRegionCorrespondence; // Each GT and MS regions seperated
00104                 vector<string> vec_ms_regions;          //set of MS regions for each GT region
00105 
00106                 vector<string>::iterator it_correspondence;
00107                 vector<string>::iterator it_region_correspondence;
00108                 vector<string>::iterator it_ms_regions;
00109                 int gt_index;
00110                 int ms_index;
00111                 string regCorres = evaluatorObject.getRegionCorrespondence();
00112 
00113                 boost::split(vecCorrespondence, regCorres, boost::is_any_of(";"));
00114 
00115                 //Evaluation for each correspondence
00116 
00117                 it_correspondence=vecCorrespondence.begin();
00118                 while(it_correspondence != vecCorrespondence.end()){
00119 
00120                         //getting each gt-ms region correspondence
00121                         boost::split(vecRegionCorrespondence, *it_correspondence, boost::is_any_of(":"));
00122                         it_region_correspondence = vecRegionCorrespondence.begin();
00123 
00124                         //getting the ms regions for each gt-region
00125                         boost::split(vec_ms_regions, *(it_region_correspondence+1), boost::is_any_of(","));
00126                         it_ms_regions = vec_ms_regions.begin();
00127 
00128                         //Coparing each GT-MS region pair
00129                         while (it_ms_regions != vec_ms_regions.end()) {
00130                                 string temp;
00131                                 temp = *it_region_correspondence;
00132                                 gt_index = atoi(temp.c_str());
00133                                 temp = *it_ms_regions;
00134                                 ms_index = atoi(temp.c_str());
00135 
00136                                 //Actual Region Comparison
00137                                 int count=0;
00138                                                 count = compareVectors(evaluatorObject.vectorGt[gt_index-1],evaluatorObject.vectorMs[ms_index-1]);
00139 
00140                                 //storing info for comparisons done to not repeat again
00141                                 stringstream stream_temp;
00142                                 stream_temp << gt_index << ":" << ms_index;
00143                                 vec_comparisons.push_back(stream_temp.str().c_str());
00144 
00145                                 //Storing Result
00146                                 resultOverlap[gt_index-1][ms_index-1] = count;          //storing the overlap result
00147                                 it_ms_regions++;
00148                         }
00149 
00150                         it_correspondence++;
00151                 }
00152         }
00153         //Brute Force comparison for the rest of the points
00154         for(int i = 0; i < evaluatorObject.getCountGt(); i++){
00155 
00156                 for(int j = 0; j < evaluatorObject.getCountMs(); j++){
00157                         //checking if the comparison is already done
00158                         stringstream stream_temp;
00159                         stream_temp<<i+1<<":"<<j+1;
00160 
00161                         if( find(vec_comparisons.begin(),vec_comparisons.end(),stream_temp.str().c_str()) == vec_comparisons.end()){
00162                                 int count=0;
00163                                                 count = compareVectors(evaluatorObject.vectorGt[i],evaluatorObject.vectorMs[j]);
00164 
00165                                 resultOverlap[i][j] = count;            //storing the overlap result
00166                         }
00167                 }
00168         }
00169 
00170         //Calculating the unlabelled pixels from each region
00171         for ( int i =0; i<evaluatorObject.getCountGt(); i++){
00172                 if(!evaluatorObject.vectorGt[i].empty())
00173                         resultOverlap[i][evaluatorObject.getCountMs()] = evaluatorObject.vectorGt[i].size();
00174 
00175         }
00176 
00177         //Calculating labelled noise
00178         for ( int i =0; i<evaluatorObject.getCountMs(); i++){
00179                 if(!evaluatorObject.vectorMs[i].empty())
00180                         resultOverlap[evaluatorObject.getCountGt()][i] = evaluatorObject.vectorMs[i].size();
00181         }
00182 
00183 
00184 }
00185 
00186 void MetricCalculator::calculateGtMetrics(){
00187 
00188         for (int i=0; i < evaluatorObject.getCountGt(); i++) {
00189                 int maxIndex=0;
00190                 int max = resultOverlap[i][0];
00191                 for(int j = 0; j<evaluatorObject.getCountMs(); j++)
00192                 {
00193                         if( resultOverlap[i][j] > max ){
00194                                 max = resultOverlap[i][j];
00195                                 maxIndex=j;
00196                         }
00197                 }
00198 
00199 
00200                 //size of region
00201                 resultOverlap[i][evaluatorObject.getCountMs()+1]=0;
00202                 for(int j = 0; j< evaluatorObject.getCountMs();j++){
00203                         resultOverlap[i][evaluatorObject.getCountMs()+1] +=resultOverlap[i][j];
00204                 }
00205                 resultGtMetrics[i][size_of_region_gt]=(resultOverlap[i][evaluatorObject.getCountMs()+1]/evaluatorObject.getImageSize()) * 100;
00206                 //correct_detection
00207                 resultGtMetrics[i][correct_detection] = (resultOverlap[i][maxIndex] /resultOverlap[i][evaluatorObject.getCountMs()+1]) * 100;
00208                 //no_of_overseg_regions
00209                 int temp=0;
00210                 for(int j = 0; j< evaluatorObject.getCountMs();j++){
00211                         if(resultOverlap[i][j]>0) temp++;
00212                 }
00213                 if(temp>0)resultGtMetrics[i][no_overseg_region]=temp-1;
00214                 else resultGtMetrics[i][no_overseg_region]=0;
00215                 //amount_of_overseg
00216                 resultGtMetrics[i][percent_overseg_region] =0;
00217                 for(int j = 0; j< evaluatorObject.getCountMs();j++){
00218                         if(j != maxIndex) resultGtMetrics[i][percent_overseg_region] += resultOverlap[i][j];
00219                 }
00220                 resultGtMetrics[i][percent_overseg_region] = (resultGtMetrics[i][percent_overseg_region]/resultOverlap[i][evaluatorObject.getCountMs()+1])*100;
00221                 //amount of non-classification
00222                 resultGtMetrics[i][percent_non_classification] = (resultOverlap[i][evaluatorObject.getCountMs()]/resultOverlap[i][evaluatorObject.getCountMs()+1])*100;
00223 
00224         }
00225 
00226 }
00227 void MetricCalculator::calculateMsMetrics(){
00228         for (int i = 0; i<evaluatorObject.getCountMs(); i++){
00229 
00230                 //counting best fit
00231                 double max = resultOverlap[0][i];
00232                 int maxIndex = 0;
00233                 for(int j = 0; j<evaluatorObject.getCountGt(); j++)
00234                 {
00235                         if( resultOverlap[j][i] > max ){
00236                                 max = resultOverlap[j][i];
00237                                 maxIndex=j;
00238                         }
00239                 }
00240 
00241                 //total pixels in the ith ms region
00242                 double total_points_ms = 0;
00243 
00244                 for (int j=0; j<evaluatorObject.getCountGt(); j++){
00245                         total_points_ms += resultOverlap[j][i];
00246                 }
00247 
00248 
00249 
00250                 //MS region size
00251                 resultMsMetrics[i][size_of_region_ms] = ( total_points_ms/evaluatorObject.getImageSize() )*100;
00252 
00253                 //percentage of wrong classification
00254                 resultMsMetrics[i][percent_wrong_classification] =0;
00255                 for(int j = 0; j< evaluatorObject.getCountGt()+1;j++){
00256                         if(j != maxIndex) {
00257                                 resultMsMetrics[i][percent_wrong_classification] += resultOverlap[j][i];
00258                         }
00259                 }
00260                 resultMsMetrics[i][percent_wrong_classification] = (resultMsMetrics[i][percent_wrong_classification]/total_points_ms)*100;
00261 
00262                 //no of under segmented regions
00263                 int temp=0;
00264                 for(int j = 0; j< evaluatorObject.getCountGt();j++){
00265                         if(resultOverlap[j][i]>0) temp++;
00266                 }
00267                 if(temp>0)resultMsMetrics[i][no_underseg_region]=temp-1;
00268                 else resultMsMetrics[i][no_underseg_region]=0;
00269 
00270 
00271                 //amount_of_underseg
00272                 resultMsMetrics[i][percent_underseg] =0;
00273                 for(int j = 0; j< evaluatorObject.getCountGt();j++){
00274                         if(j != maxIndex) resultMsMetrics[i][percent_underseg] += resultOverlap[j][i];
00275                 }
00276                 resultMsMetrics[i][percent_underseg] = (resultMsMetrics[i][percent_underseg]/total_points_ms)*100;
00277 
00278 
00279                 //amount of noise-classification
00280                 resultMsMetrics[i][percent_noise_classification] = (resultOverlap[evaluatorObject.getCountGt()][i]/total_points_ms)*100;
00281 
00282         }
00283 
00284 }

00286 
00287 int MetricCalculator::compareVectors (vector<string>& v1, vector<string>& v2){
00288         int count=0;
00289         vector<string>::iterator it1,it2;
00290         string s;
00291 
00292         it1 = v1.begin();
00293         while(it1!=v1.end()){
00294                 s = *it1;
00295 
00296                 it2 = find(v2.begin(), v2.end(),s);
00297 
00298                 if (  it2 != v2.end() ) {
00299                         count++;
00300                         v2.erase(it2);
00301                         v1.erase(it1);
00302                 }
00303                 else{
00304                         it1++;
00305                 }
00306         }
00307         return count;
00308 }
00309 
00310 int MetricCalculator::maxElementIndex(double array[],int start,int end)
00311 {
00312         int index=start;
00313         if(start<=end){
00314                 double max = array[start];       // start with max = first element
00315 
00316                 for(int i = start; i<=end; i++)
00317                 {
00318                         if(array[i] > max){
00319                                 max = array[i];
00320                                 index=i;
00321                         }
00322                 }
00323 
00324         }
00325         return index;
00326 }
